description: Former Texas Gov. Rick Perry, on CNBC, discusses the strides made in his state in education, jobs creation and tax reform, and also commented on his decision to enter the 2016 presidential election.
title: Perry: The Record in Texas
title_page: Perry: The Record in Texas - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Former Texas Gov. Rick Perry, on CNBC, discusses the strides made in his state in education, jobs creation and tax reform, and also commented on his decision to enter the 2016 presidential election.
